story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Ethiopia, there lived a wise and kind lion named Asrat. Asrat was known throughout the land for his bravery, his generosity, and his love for all creatures big and small.

One day, a little lamb named Selam wandered into the meadow where Asrat lived. Selam was lost and scared, but when Asrat saw her, he gently approached her and asked what had happened. Selam explained that she had strayed from her flock and didn't know how to find her way back home.

Asrat smiled warmly at Selam and promised to help her. Together, they set out on a journey through the lush forests and rolling hills of Ethiopia. Along the way, they met friendly monkeys swinging through the trees, colorful birds singing in the sky, and wise old elephants sharing stories of the past.

As they traveled, Selam learned valuable lessons about courage, friendship, and the importance of helping others. And Asrat, in turn, discovered the joy of guiding and protecting a vulnerable creature in need.

Finally, after many days of adventure and discovery, they reached Selam's flock. The other lambs welcomed her back with open arms, grateful to see her safe and sound. Asrat smiled proudly, knowing that he had made a difference in Selam's life.

As night fell, Asrat returned to his meadow, feeling grateful for the day's journey and the new friendship he had formed with Selam. And as the stars twinkled overhead, he whispered a gentle lullaby to all the creatures of the land, reminding them of the beauty and wonder that surrounded them.

And so, dear child, remember the story of Asrat and Selam, and know that kindness, courage, and friendship will always guide you on your own adventures. Goodnight, sweet child, and may your dreams be filled with magic and love.
